mapper.select: SELECT ss.store_name AS storeName, ss.store_ower AS storeOwer, su.user_name AS userName, sa.area_name AS areaName, (SELECT area_name FROM shop_area WHERE id = sa.parent_id) AS parentName, ssc.class_name AS className FROM shop_store ss LEFT JOIN shop_area sa ON sa.id = ss.area_id LEFT JOIN shop_user su ON ss.id = su.store_id LEFT JOIN shop_store_class ssc ON ss.sc_id = ssc.id
